Understate: The claim may understate the situation by stating that Chris Christie has not paid any state money into the pension system, when in fact a payment of nearly $500 million is scheduled to be made.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by not fully acknowledging the scheduled payment and implying that no payments have been made at all.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to fully justify the statement that Chris Christie has not made any pension payments, as there is a scheduled payment and a policy requiring future payments.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that Chris Christie has not made full pension payments, but has made partial payments as required by law.
